channel.title: linux on Beautiful Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in linux on Beautiful Hugo

item.title: Dollar Day
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: I daily look bcentral.cl to view the CLP price of one dollar (useful to buy outside of my contry), then, bored to open the web to view the price I write a script to get it automatically. You get the code on http://github.com/dubcl/dollar-day usage $ ./dollarday.sh Cheers.

item.title: Change user password of HP iLO or Lenovo IMM from Linux
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: When you have a new machine and you forgot write the Administrator password on any paper or note before installing, you can change this from you linux install with ipmitools. First, if you read the pass post about Assign an IP to HP iLO or IBM System X from Linux, you know how get the configuration channel, if not, read it ;) Once you get the channel you need to list iLO / IMM users, for example:
